body:
I searched the author because he seems to like thicc thighs. Hmmm. 
I doubt I'll ever get married before I die but if I find a girl. I'd have our room sealed off, all doors and windows locked, curtains down, signals jammed, I'll use candles for lighting if I have to, fck electricity, have all holes blocked so only god knows what I'm about to do to her everytime I put her on top of the bed. I sound like a possessive rapist kidnapper antagonistic bastard or something. But who gives a damn. Even though I can't read Chinese I can tell. That's better than having this kind of shit plot happen in any timeline or lifetime. But hey, I'm gonna die as a virgin in this timeline anyway \_(ツ)_/ so that'll never happen and also I just made you waste your lifeforce when you read this whole thing
I want plot with ntr not this crap
These kind of ntr is getting me bored.  I want more spicy ntr
these authors are all dumb af
imagine get blackmail cause you have sex in your house... what worst you know who film it and literally have the evidence.
